data.eml:eml: Phylogenetic relationships of the Balkan Moitessieriidae (Caenogastropoda: Truncatelloidea)

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Hofman, Sebastian, Rysiewska, Aleksandra, Osikowski, Artur, Grego, Jozef, Sket, Boris, Prevorčnik, Simona, Zagmajster, Maja, Falniowski, Andrzej (2018): Phylogenetic relationships of the Balkan Moitessieriidae (Caenogastropoda: Truncatelloidea). Zootaxa 4486 (3): 311-339, DOI: https://doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.4486.3.5
